<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">FileSystem</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is a utility class used to parse user-provided text files with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &quot;special case lists&quot; for code sanitizers. Such files are used to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// define an &quot;ABI list&quot; for DataFlowSanitizer and allow/exclusion lists for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sanitizers like AddressSanitizer or UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Empty lines and lines starting with &quot;#&quot; are ignored. Sections are defined</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// using a &#39;&#91;section&#95;name&#93;&#39; header and can be used to specify sanitizers the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// entries below it apply to. Section names are globs, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// entries without a section header match all sections (e.g. an &#39;&#91;&#42;&#93;&#39; header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is assumed.)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The remaining lines should have the form:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///   prefix:glob&#95;pattern&#91;=category&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If category is not specified, it is assumed to be empty string.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Definitions of &quot;prefix&quot; and &quot;category&quot; are sanitizer-specific. For example,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sanitizer exclusion support prefixes &quot;src&quot;, &quot;mainfile&quot;, &quot;fun&quot; and &quot;global&quot;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &quot;glob&#95;pattern&quot; defines source files, main files, functions or globals which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// shouldn&#39;t be instrumented.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Examples of categories:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &quot;functional&quot;: used in DFSan to list functions with pure functional</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///                 semantics.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &quot;init&quot;: used in ASan exclusion list to disable initialization-order bugs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">///           detection for certain globals or source files.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Full special case list file example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ---</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;address&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// # Excluded items:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fun:&#42;&#95;ZN4base6subtle&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// global:&#42;global&#95;with&#95;bad&#95;access&#95;or&#95;initialization&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// global:&#42;global&#95;with&#95;initialization&#95;issues&#42;=init</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type:&#42;Namespace::ClassName&#42;=init</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// src:file&#95;with&#95;tricky&#95;code.cc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// src:ignore-global-initializers-issues.cc=init</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">/// mainfile:main&#95;file.cc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;dataflow&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// # Functions with pure functional semantics:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fun:cos=functional</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fun:sin=functional</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ---</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a96b799c5b8a9865e51dfb44b0c8498a1">SpecialCaseList</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 0 and writes an error message to string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SpecialCaseList&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">         std::string &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Parses the special case list from a memory buffer. On failure, returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 0 and writes an error message to string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Parses the special case list entries from files. On failure, reports a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// fatal error.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SpecialCaseList&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a6c0343ae2b29d3a9882c0cfc4bee8c03">createOrDie</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;std::string&gt; &amp;Paths, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">llvm::vfs::FileSystem</a> &amp;FS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a973602c10952d42c1862f2e745280ec8"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a973602c10952d42c1862f2e745280ec8">~SpecialCaseList</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true, if special case list contains a line</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   @Prefix:&lt;E&gt;=@Category</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// where @Query satisfies the glob &lt;E&gt; in a given @Section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
